dict.acceptation: 撕裂，撕碎；划伤；夺走，扯掉；（使）分裂；

sent.orig: TEAR might even be entrusted with troops to lead in the field.
sent.trans: 甚至可以将部队托付于TEAR,由她在战场上指挥。

sent.orig: Compare cut, saw, chop, hack, slash and tear.
Leather-Physical and mechanical tests-Determination of tear load-Part 1: single edge tear.
sent.trans: 皮革。物理和机械试验。撕裂力的测定。第1部分：单边撕裂。

sent.orig: This made tear after tear roll down my face.
sent.trans: 想到此，我的眼泪不停地顺着脸颊流下来。

sent.orig: If you are a tear in my eye, I wouldn't cry tear of losing you.
sent.trans: 如果你是我眼里的一滴泪，我不会哭出来把你失去）。
